# fillMode

**Instance Property**

Determines if the receiver’s presentation is frozen or removed once its active duration has completed.

## Declaration

```swift
var fillMode: CAMediaTimingFillMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

The possible values are described in [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/fill-modes]. The default is [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAMediaTimingFillMode/removed].

## Playback Modes

- **autoreverses**: Determines if the receiver plays in the reverse upon completion.
